item.title: [508]how can i get this interface to display items?[508]
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

well i went digging and i wanted to see if i could get a clue scroll to first display items, i have found this chunk of code

public void setItems(Player p, int interfaceId, int childId, int type, int[] itemArray, int[] itemAmt) {

and all i want it to do is display on interface 364 and i want it to display the items 1 and 2 and 2 of them but i dont know how ive tried to use this code but i cant get it to work this is the command i have to get it to work but to no prevail.

}else if (cmd[0].equals("clue")) { p.frames.showInterface(p, 364); p.frames.setItems(p, 364, 364, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); }

Read full topic
